name: Park a Lot
summary: Park a Lot is a classic browser-based simulation game released in the early 2000s. The game challenges players to step into the role of a parking lot attendant, skillfully navigating vehicles to designated spots within tight time limits. Known for its simple yet addictive gameplay, 'Park a Lot' combines strategy and time management, making it a favorite among fans of casual gaming during the Flash era. Its charming retro design and increasing levels of difficulty provide players with an engaging experience that rewards precision and quick thinking.
